list-item.p: Consists of dengue case counts from five locations: Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, Brazil and Mexico, coupled with Google trends data—top ten Google query terms in each location which are correlated with the search query ‘dengue’.
Error Metrics: RMS Error, Mean Absolute Error, Mean Absolute Percentage Error
Forecasting Targets: real-time dengue incidence, peak value and peak time of dengue incidence for each season
